text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1080. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Refurbished: ASUS ROG Zephyrus GX501VI-US74 15.6" 120 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Apex Legends. The build quality of the Refurbished: ASUS ROG Zephyrus GX501VI-US74 15.6" 120 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the speakers is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

The Refurbished: ASUS ROG Zephyrus GX501VI-US74 15.6" 120 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for content creation and gaming, but the keyboard could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.
